title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 107.2 - Marital or other status
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 107.2 - Marital or other status

State Regulations

Tax Law, ยง 607(b)
A taxpayer's marital or other status, under sections
601, 606 (b)
and
614
of the Tax Law, is the same as the taxpayer's marital, head of
household or surviving spouse status for the purpose of establishing the
applicable Federal income tax rates. As used in this Subchapter, the term
single individual
means an unmarried individual other than a
head of household or a surviving spouse. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
107.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
